derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Anglo-Norman French suer, based on Latin sequi 'follow'. Early senses were very similar to those of the verb follow

entry.tran: (通常为索赔而)控告，对…提起诉讼
entry.def: If you sue someone, you start a legal case against them, usually in order to claim money from them because they have harmed you in some way.

example.ex: Mr Warren sued him for libel over the remarks...
example.tran: 沃伦先生控告他散布诽谤性言论。

example.ex: The company could be sued for damages...
example.tran: 该公司可能会被起诉，要求其赔偿损失。
